Extends the IAsyncRepository<T> interface with an additional method for Order entities

Methods

ListAllAsync(Guid)

Retrieves all Order entities from the database with the specified EcommerceUser ID.

Task<IEnumerable<Order>?> ListAllAsync(Guid userId)

Parameters

userId Guid

The ID of the EcommerceUser to find all corresponding Order entities

Returns

Task<IEnumerable<Order>>

A IEnumerable of all Order entities found; A empty IEnumerable if none are found. null if an error occurs.
